dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] www.mytibia.friko.pl]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 22, 2005 10:33 AM
To: schneider@cipsoft.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] www.mytibia.friko.pl]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1


Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] www.mytibia.friko.pl
Date: Tue, 22 Mar 2005 17:08:45 +0100
From: Nicole Schneider <schneider@cipsoft.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com

March 22, 2005


Dear Sirs and Madams:

The internet address www.mytibia.friko.pl is assigned to your address area.

Apart from the fact that this side offends against the copyright rules of
our official web side www.tibia.com, this reproduction of our web side is
used to obtain secret account data from our customers.

We ask you to remove the side www.mytibia.friko.pl immediately from the
internet.

For further questions please feel free to contact me via email.

Yours sincerely,

Nicole Schneider
CipSoft GmbH





- --
- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
THe Planet Internet Services, LLC
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.1 (GNU/Linux)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCQEjFvK/XpJs6oyURAlAEAJ9bWkekDzqCdhOf7SY6AQiCW41vywCfc7hF
QXrEHy7tgm1wwpoL/gaU0YM=
=Z0aS
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
